title: The Un-Released Cigar: What Does The Future Taste Like
itunes:title: The Un-Released Cigar: What Does The Future Taste Like
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire…  We have a Pre-Release of a Cigar from United Cigars that Oliver Nivaud, Director of Sales says we have to smoke. So we included it in the Care Package and fire it up in the first hour as Oliver joins us live in studio.

We also have a announcement from David Garofalo of a personal nature that you want to tune in for.

In the second hour we announce who will make the 2021 Firecracker plus we smoke the prototype of another cigar slated for release later this year.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
